name: Submarine Periscope Lens
description:
"It fell out and we can't get it back in..."
—Nessa

name: Pact Medal Of Valor
description:
"The Pact recognizes your valor in combat."
—Tactician Coehl

name: Monk's Beer Stein
description:
"These steins are crafted extra sturdy. They won't break over a bandit's head, and the can block a centaur arrow without leaking any ale."
—Brother Vince

name: Orrian Pottery Shard
description: <c=@flavor>The historical significance of this shard barely makes up for its pungent odor.</c>

name: Moa Collar
description:
"Our moas prefer the spiked collars."
—Cassie

name: Pact Medal of Accommodation
description:
"We are still sorting this out and as you can see our award naming scheme could use some improvement. Thanks none the less."
—Lightbringer Surefoot

name: Magical Orrian Lure
description:
"So magical the fish catch it."
—Supply Sergeant Mattimer

name: Light Of Doric
description:
"Stories tell of a procession of lights through this area. It must have been beautiful with lights such as these."
—Keeper Lyrda

name: Pact Medal Of Recognition
description:
"For a hero. Your hardwork will not be forgotten."
—Keeper Jonez Deadrun

name: Rare Ascalonian Coin
description: <c=@flavor>"The emblem for King Adelbern is barely recognizable, and the writing has been completely worn off."</c>

name: Measuring Spoon
description:
"Make sure to use heaping spoonfuls."
—Eda

name: Boar Tusk
description:
"If you think this one is big, you should see the one above the fireplace."
—Hunter Block

name: Drake Scale
description:
"Did you see the size of that thing?"
—Travis

name: Orrian Master Scholar Certificate
description: <c=@flavor>"...awarded for examplary wisdom, research, bravado, and intelligence in the field of..."</c>

name: Wurm Tooth
description:
"Who knew wurms had teeth?"
—Diah

name: Chisel
description: <c=@flavor>The area is littered with these. The rumor is these were used by Malchor."</c>

name: Magical Orrian Lure
description: <c=@flavor>"So magical the fish catch it."</c>

name: Orrian Mirror Shard
description:
"Are we mere reflections of the truth?"
—Nessa

name: Light Of Doric
description:
"Stories tell of a procession of lights through this area. It must have been beautiful with lights such as these."
—Keeper Lyrda

name: Mellaggan Safety Shell
description: <c=@flavor>This shell keeps quaggan safe in dangerous waters.</c>

name: Orrian Mirror Shard
description:
"Are we mere reflections of the truth?"
—Nessa

name: Submarine Periscope Lens
description:
"It fell out and we can't get it back in..."
—Nessa

name: Chisel
description: <c=@flavor>The area is littered with these. The rumor is these were used by Malchor."</c>

name: Intercepted Inquest Calculations
description: <c=@flavor>"(X, R(x,z) ≥ min(R(x,y),R(y,z) - X, A(x*y) ≥ min(A(x),B(x))) + A(x*y−1) ≥ min(A(x),A(y−1))"</c>

name: Pact Invasion Battle Plan
description:
"I'm surprised this survived first contact with the enemy."
—Magister Pagga

name: Smuggled Contraband
description:
"Share and share alike. Sometimes a person needs a little more—uh—motivation, to be of the giving sort."
—Maakel The Immortal

name: Claypool Militia Badge
description: <c=@flavor>"Trained Member of the Claypool Militia"</c>

name: Intercepted Inquest Calculations
description: <c=@flavor>"(X, R(x,z) ≥ min(R(x,y),R(y,z) - X, A(x*y) ≥ min(A(x),B(x))) + A(x*y−1) ≥ min(A(x),A(y−1))"</c>

name: Ancient Shining Blade Emblem
description:
"These must have some kind of old power inbued in them."
—Seraph Soldier Dianna

name: Lucky Centaur Horseshoe
description:
"Hope it makes you luckier than the centaur it came from."
—Barnaby

name: Orrian Pottery Shard
description: <c=@flavor>The historical significance of this shard barely makes up for its pungent odor.</c>

name: Pact Invasion Battle Plan
description:
"I'm surprised this survived first contact with the enemy."
—Magister Pagga

name: Tengu Feather Charm
description:
"It is said our feathers can control the winds."
—Sangdo Swiftwing

name: Rusty Iron Key
description: <c=@flavor>"There's more rust than iron left here."</c>

name: Wren Trading Coin
description:
"They used these to trade goods a long time ago. Sometimes its easy to forget these used to be people."
—Lightbringer Zykk

name: Order of Whispers Secret Code
description: <c=@flavor>"Asura, Orrian, Local, Attack"</c>

name: Order of Whispers Secret Code
description: <c=@flavor>"Asura, Orrian, Local, Attack"</c>

name: Mellaggan Safety Shell
description: <c=@flavor>This shell keeps quaggan safe in dangerous waters.</c>

name: Pact Shell Casing
description:
"I have one thing to say to Zhaitan. Boom."
—Warmaster Chan

name: Centaur Arrowhead
description: <c=@flavor>"It's chipped and stained with old blood."</c>

name: Seraph Emblem
description:
"You paid for this in centaur blood."
—Diedra

name: Seraph Dog Tags
description: <c=@flavor>"The inscription worn and illegible."</c>

name: Firefly in a Jar
description: <c=@flavor>The insect inside this vessel glows brightly.</c>

name: Fish Hook
description:
"This is my own special hook design that I carve out of dried driftwood."
—Fisherman Will

name: Shiny Skritt Trinket
description:
"Skritt will steal anything not nailed down, and even then it better be nailed to something big."
—Laborer Cardy

name: Vigil Scout Medal
description:
"It's amazing what you can find in a old Skritt cave."
—Crusader Aisling

name: Ancient Krytan Jewelry
description: <c=@flavor>This piece is elaborate in ways not seen in modern jewelry design.</c>

name: Lucky Pirate Rum Cork
description: <c=@flavor>Smells lucky.</c>

name: Wren Trading Coin
description:
"They used these to trade goods a long time ago. Sometimes its easy to forget these used to be people."
—Lightbringer Zykk

name: Chewed Dog Whistle
description:
"Whatever dog got hold of this whistle has really big teeth."
—Paden

name: Bandit Ring
description:
"Probably twice-stolen anyhow..."
—Waldo

name: Firefly in a Jar
description: <c=@flavor>The insect inside this vessel glows brightly.</c>

name: Sweet Ring
description: <c=@flavor>"This ring is made of rock candy."</c>

name: Harpy Feather
description:
"So, here's the thing: you can have lots of harpies, or we can finish this dam, but I don't think you can have both."
—Flannum

name: Crab Bedazzler
description: <c=@flavor>Perfect for giving any drab crab some style.</c>

name: Rusty Trident Tip
description:
"Either the quaggan used it backward or this one didn't fit."
—Scholar Sharpslash

name: Lucky Pirate Rum Cork
description: <c=@flavor>Smells lucky.</c>

name: Cannon Fuse
description: <c=@flavor>Store in a dry, cool place.</c>

name: Frog in a Jar
description: <c=@flavor>The frog contained in the vessel is resting. Holes poked in the top ensure the frog will have plenty of air.</c>

name: Ghostly Doubloon
description:
"This used to be cursed but the Durmand Priory removed it."
—Professor Maciver

name: Super Sweet Ring
description: <c=@flavor>"This ring is made of rock candy."</c>

name: Deactivated Dredge Mine
description: <c=@flavor>This weapon is deactivated, but still possesses an explosive core. Do not drop.</c>

name: Smashed Inquest Capacitor
description: <c=@flavor>The capacitor is broken, but it might be useful elsewhere.</c>

name: Rusty Trident Tip
description:
"Either the quaggan used it backward or this one didn't fit."
—Scholar Sharpslash

name: Cannon Fuse
description: <c=@flavor>Store in a dry, cool place.</c>

name: Brightheart Orchid
description:
"We've managed to save a handful of these beautiful, rare flowers. Protect it with your life."
—Caedmon

name: Shrunken Head
description:
"And I thought I had a headache. We don't know what these are made of, but those Ettins drop them all over the place."
—Deputy Jenks

name: Queen's Medal
description: <c=@flavor>"A medal rewarded by the queen for exemplary efforts."</c>

name: Dwayna's Salmic Charm
description:
"While some may pray to Balthazar, this reminds me that a soldier's peace is inevitable."
—Sergeant Yarbrough

name: Crab Bedazzler
description: <c=@flavor>Perfect for giving any drab crab some style.</c>

name: Small Troll Stone
description:
"I find these all over. The trolls seem to really like them."
—Rune Hunter

name: Seraph Scout Badge
description:
"The queen and the Seraph honor you."
—Erika Rane

name: Triskell Hook Earrings
description:
"The hooks are unique to this region. Some people like the way they look."
—Mayor Trisk

name: Mona's Ring
description:
"Quit talking and buy something."
—Mona

name: Ornate Feather Duster
description: <c=@flavor>Mostly used for a decoration.</c>

name: Ghostly Doubloon
description:
"This used to be cursed but the Durmand Priory removed it."
—Professor Maciver

name: Frog in a Jar
description: <c=@flavor>The frog contained in the vessel is resting. Holes poked in the top ensure the frog will have plenty of air.</c>

name: Ettin Nose Ring
description:
"Ettin ring make you strong!"
—Krug

name: Vial of Purified Ocean Water
description: <c=@flavor>A vial of bluest water.</c>

name: Glowing Lodestone
description:
"I've been experimenting with these mysterious stones, and I can assure you I've mostly gotten them figured out...I think."
—Gilli

name: Petrified Ectoplasm
description:
"Why did they come here? What were these used for? If only I could find the answers."
—Historian Garrod

name: Gold-Lined Jackdaw Pirate Patch
description: <c=@flavor>This ensemble is only missing a parrot.</c>

name: Commemorative First Haven Metal Spoon
description: <c=@flavor>This spoon commemorates the first silverware produced by the fine folk of First Haven.</c>

name: Bandit Emblem
description:
"Some people think it makes 'em look tougher."
—Waldo

name: Rare Jungle Orchid
description: <c=@flavor>This rare flower grows in the deep jungle.</c>

name: Memoirs of Captain Greywind
description:
"Because the surrounding area is so dangerous, I have taken it upon myself to provide training to all of Ascalon. As a friend of the settlement, you may train under me as well."
—Captain Greywind

name: Honorary Company Membership Badge
description: <c=@flavor>"You're one of us now. Just don't let it go to your head." -Cap</c>

name: Doolsileep's Seashell Charm
description:
"Quaggan makes these bejeweled sea shells to protect others from the blood witch's curses. Maybe one day it can protect you."
—Doolsileep

name: Togatl Truffle Charm
description:
"The truffle is a symbol of survival in tough times."
—Matlal

name: Lionscout Medal
description:
"Trade is life. Thanks."
—Micah

name: Harathi Catapult Spring
description:
"Bet their catapult won't work without this!"
—Tripp

name: Togatl Magic Vial
description:
"The truffle oil is mixed with our tribal magic."
—Matlal

name: Ancient Krytan Jewelry
description: <c=@flavor>This piece is elaborate in ways not seen in modern jewelry design.</c>

name: Vial of Purified Ocean Water
description: <c=@flavor>A vial of bluest water.</c>

name: Deactivated Dredge Mine
description: <c=@flavor>This weapon is deactivated, but still possesses an explosive core. Do not drop.</c>

name: Enscribed Vollym Forget-Me-Not
description:
"You've got some bite after all—just not enough to best the best."
—Vollym

name: Ancient White Mantle Badge
description: <c=@flavor>The mark of the White Mantle is still visible on the badge's dented face.</c>

name: Vigil Scout Medal
description:
"It's amazing what you can find in a old Skritt cave."
—Crusader Aisling

name: Smashed Centaur Catapult Gear
description: <c=@flavor>"One less weapon for the centaur war machine."</c>

name: Broken Shackles
description: <c=@flavor>Freedom.</c>

name: Cane's Approval
description: <c=@flavor>"Couldn't have done better myself. Well, maybe."—Cane</c>

name: Rare Jungle Orchid
description: <c=@flavor>This rare flower grows in the deep jungle.</c>

name: Seraph Medal of Honor
description: <c=@flavor>"For service above and beyond the call of duty."</c>

name: Milton's Silver Apple Corer
description:
"Never worry about swallowing an apple seed ever again!"
—Eilla

name: Seraph Trebuchet User's Manual
description: <c=@flavor>Point away from face.</c>

name: Smashed Inquest Capacitor
description: <c=@flavor>The capacitor is broken, but it might be useful elsewhere.</c>

name: Antique Silver Ascalonian Ring
description:
"This beautiful ring represents a more peaceful time for the citizens of Ascalon."
—Bronson

name: Half-burned Candle
description: <c=@flavor>A spare light when caught in the dark.</c>

name: Shiny Frying Pan
description: <c=@flavor>"It's either never been used, or it's been licked clean."</c>

name: Handwritten Note
description:
"The centaurs took everything from us, but people like you will help us take it back."
—Anonymous Refugee

name: Arena Armlet
description: <c=@flavor>Fashionable, yet functional.</c>

name: Antique Golden Ascalonian Ring
description:
"This beautiful ring represents a more peaceful time for the citizens of Ascalon."
—Bronson

name: Half-burned Candle
description: <c=@flavor>A spare light when caught in the dark.</c>

name: Pristine Ancient Krytan Dabloon
description:
"One day I was giving a pirate a lively thrashing. As he turned tail to run, I swung my sword a final time and slit his coin-purse straight down the middle."
—Lionguard Mei

name: Orrian Relic
description:
"This should help on the journey ahead!"
—Arcanist Riagan

name: Pristine Gold Ring
description: <c=@flavor>A plain, but well-made piece of jewelry.</c>

name: Seraph Trebuchet User's Manual
description: <c=@flavor>Point away from face.</c>

name: Honorary Company Membership Badge
description: <c=@flavor>"You're one of us now. Just don't let it go to your head." —Cap</c>

name: Unscathed Lionguard Field Trowel Manual
description:
"This one looks as though it hasn't been hit with a pickaxe."
—Lionguard Rhyn

name: Feather Duster
description: <c=@flavor>Good for cleaning those nooks and crannies.</c>

name: Blemished Ancient Krytan Royal Family Crest
description:
"A fine heirloom accessory from the ancient Krytan family."
—Farmhand Abhean

name: Tattered Slade Pirate Flag
description: <c=@flavor>A weather-beaten pirate flag.</c>

name: Arena Armlet
description: <c=@flavor>Fashionable, yet functional.</c>

name: Rusty Ancient Krytan Dabloon
description:
"One day I was giving a pirate a lively thrashing. As he turned tail to run, I swung my sword a final time and slit his coin-purse straight down the middle."
—Lionguard Mei

name: Dirty Lionguard Field Trowel Manual
description:
"This field manual appears to have had some heavy use, possibly as a shield. A few of the pages look like they've been gnawed on a bit."
—Lionguard Rhyn

name: Ancient Krytan Royal Family Crest
description:
"A fine heirloom accessory from the ancient Krytan family."
—Farmhand Abhean

name: Incinergen Labs Medal
description: <c=@flavor>"Celebrating the superiority of Incinergen golems."</c>

name: Broken Centaur Steel Shackles
description:
"Never again will these shackles be used to enslave another being."
—Bronson

name: Slade Pirate Flag
description: <c=@flavor>A trophy flag of the Slade Pirate crew.</c>

name: Pristine Gold Ring
description: <c=@flavor>A plain, but well-made piece of jewelry.</c>

name: Broken Centaur Iron Shackles
description:
"Never again will these shackles be used to enslave another being."
—Bronson

name: Memoirs of Captain Greywind, Unabridged
description:
"I didn't like leaving them behind to distract the White Mantle army, but Ascalonian soldiers are survivors first and foremost. I'm sure they'll turn up."
—Captain Greywind

name: Smashed Centaur Catapult Gear
description: <c=@flavor>"One less weapon for the centaur war machine."</c>

name: Ancient Ebon Vanguard Amulet
description: <c=@flavor>An amulet once worn by Ebon Vanguard soldiers in the windswept north.</c>

name: Vollym Forget-Me-Not
description:
"Another day, perhaps."
—Vollym

name: Dragonfly-Wing Earrings
description:
"Careful. The wings will tickle your neck if you move your head too fast."
—Huelic

name: Centaur Bandit Treaty Document
description: <c=@flavor>In place of signatures, the last page has hoofprint and a handprint marked in blood.</c>

name: Ancient Ebon Vanguard Amulet
description: <c=@flavor>An amulet once worn by Ebon Vanguard soldiers in the windswept north.</c>

name: Milton's Golden Apple Corer
description:
"Never worry about swallowing an apple seed ever again!"
—Eilla

name: Water Toxin Analyzer
description:
"Take care: improper maintenance of this device may result in incorrect results...or explosions."
—Blopp

name: Ancient Ring
description: <c=@flavor>"Beneath an ornate crest, the name D'Alessio is inscribed in flowing script."</c>

name: Sherrif's Battle Commendation
description: <c=@flavor>Sherrif Bloodclaw greatly appreciates your help in Junction Haven.</c>

name: Commemorative First Haven Silver Spoon
description: <c=@flavor>"This spoon commemorates the first silverware produced by the fine folk of First Haven."</c>

name: Jackdaw Pirate Patch
description: <c=@flavor>A handy change of clothes if it's every necessary to blend in with the local pirates.</c>

name: Lionguard's Battle Commendation
description: <c=@flavor>The Lionguard approve of your efforts in battle.</c>

name: Seraph Assault Kit
description: <c=@flavor>"Contents: string, paperclip, folding knife, wax..."</c>

name: Confiscated Bandit Schematics
description: <c=@flavor>A series of crude diagrams which detail the construction and application of a cabbage bomb.</c>

name: Confiscated Bandit Schematics
description: <c=@flavor>A series of crude diagrams which detail the construction and application of a cabbage bomb.</c>

name: Cane's Approval
description: <c=@flavor>"Couldn't have done better myself. Well, maybe."—Cane</c>

name: Aeronotics Labs Medal
description: <c=@flavor>"Celebrating the superiority of Aeronotics golems."</c>

name: Preserved Red Cap
description:
"Don't eat this one—the stuff I preserved it with doesn't taste too good."
—Elain

name: Shiny Frying Pan
description: <c=@flavor>"It's either never been used, or it's been licked clean."</c>

name: Handwritten Note
description:
"The centaurs took everything from us, but people like you will help us take it back."
—Anonymous Refugee

name: Irradiated Skritt Shiny Thing
description:
"It's quite shiny, isn't it?"
—Krew Leader Pachoo

name: Shining Blade
description: <c=@flavor>An accurate description of this tiny pocket knife.</c>

name: Seraph Assault Kit
description: <c=@flavor>"Contents: string, paperclip, folding knife, wax..."</c>

name: Terranexic Labs Medal
description: <c=@flavor>"Celebrating the superiority of Terranexic golems."</c>

name: Rata Sum Cease And Desist Order
description: <c=@flavor>Only a few words on this document are legible: "...ordered to cease and desist all experiments within the city of Rata Sum...in defiance of this order are...banishment."</c>

name: Hylek Totem
description: <c=@flavor>This totem is carved with inscriptions depicting the Hylek sun god.</c>

name: Royal Family's Jewel
description:
"I doubt the family will miss this!"
—Lindi

name: Golem Prototype Ankle Crystal
description: <c=@flavor>"Judging from the condition of this crystal, I'd say the golem this came from took quite a beating before being disassembled."—Calcutician Doola</c>

name: Ancient White Mantle Badge
description: <c=@flavor>The mark of the White Mantle is still visible on the badge's dented face.</c>

name: Broken Shackles
description: <c=@flavor>Freedom.</c>

name: Hydrone Labs Medal
description: <c=@flavor>"Celebrating the superiority of Hydrone golems."</c>

name: Missing Person Flier
description: <c=@flavor>Below a portrait, the flier reads: "Samm Volkman, last seen in the vicinity of Greenflin Plateau."</c>

name: Gyra's Radiation Detector
description:
"When it starts making noises, that means it's time to run."
—Researcher Borpp

name: Verdant Charm
description:
"Our fight against these creatures won't end. Keep this charm as a reminder to never give up."
—Valiant Caillech

name: Ancient Ring
description: <c=@flavor>"Beneath an ornate crest, the name D'Alessio is inscribed in flowing script."</c>

name: Seraph Medal of Honor
description: <c=@flavor>"For service above and beyond the call of duty."</c>

name: Deputy Peacemaker Badge
description:
"This badge confers upon you all of the responsibilites of a peacemaker with none of the credit."
—Peacemaker Owta

name: Arcane Council Petition
description: <c=@flavor>"Sign below to support removing Dr. Bleent from the Arcane Council."</c>

name: Jar of Ooze
description: <c=@flavor>"Warning: Keep tightly sealed. Some kinetic agitation is to be expected."</c>

name: Lightning Jar
description:
"The jar seems to retain a remarkable amount of heat."
—Ahjj

name: Wardenlight Emblem
description:
"When it seems darkest, light your path with action."
—Warden Gemai

name: Companion's Ring
description: <c=@flavor>The inscription on the inside reads: "Because the Cap said so."</c>

name: Lightning Rod
description:
"Can you feel the rod vibrate? It also makes a faint humming sound."
—Opticalium Researcher Oisha

name: Hylek-Slayer Badge
description: <c=@flavor>"Awarded by the Lionguard for valor in fighting the hylek."</c>

name: Shiny-beaded Junk Necklace
description: <c=@flavor>While it is shiny, it being a necklace is tenuous at best.</c>

name: Asura Gate Harmonizing Crystal
description:
"Always triple-check the resonance frequency. The smallest error may have unforeseen consequences."
—Asura Gate Technician's Guide

name: Antique Golem Head
description:
"This ancient golem head clearly substantiates the progress of asuran engineering."
—Shoon

name: Skritt Research Footage
description: <c=@flavor>This recording shows skritt engaging in some questionable behavior.</c>
